title: Anybody else experiencing a drop in FPS?
body:
I've already posted a ticket about this but I just wanted to see if anybody has any tips or if they're experiencing the same thing, a few months ago I would always get around 100-120 fps in league at medium-high settings but now I'm lucky to get 60 for more than 10 seconds, regardless of settings.

I've updated my drivers, disabled the Xbox game bar, did a clean boot, and tried the league corrupted file fixer, all of which didn't really help :/

Is anybody else experiencing these problems?

replies.body:
Same
exact
problem
for 
two
months 
now.

> [{quoted}](name=Uviux,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=FRv7cReA,comment-id=,timestamp=2017-05-28T23:21:07.569+0000)
>
> I&#039;ve already posted a ticket about this but I just wanted to see if anybody has any tips or if they&#039;re experiencing the same thing, a few months ago I would always get around 100-120 fps in league at medium-high settings but now I&#039;m lucky to get 60 for more than 10 seconds, regardless of settings.
> 
> I&#039;ve updated my drivers, disabled the Xbox game bar, did a clean boot, and tried the league corrupted file fixer, all of which didn&#039;t really help :/
> 
> Is anybody else experiencing these problems?

I noticed aswell. Few of my friends have the same issue. It's especially noticable after 25 minutes in game. The game got huge fps drops and nothing mentioned in FPS guide actually helps (other games still work like they used to) so something must be going on with League lately.

Once those tech guys get your ticket they'll be able to go pretty in-depth to make sure this is fixed. In the meantime, we can go ahead and check up on the some of the steps in our [**FPS guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) to see if that fixes it while you're waiting!
